name: A Bloody Dino Rampage PRO - Full Dinosaur Assault Version
name_original: A Bloody Dino Rampage PRO - Full Dinosaur Assault Version
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** AWESOME BLOODY DINO GAME!! **

Get ready for an absolutely bloody dino rampage! One that you've never seen before. In this action packed dino game, you play a dinosaur out on a mission to destroy all the T-Rexes that come in his way. Shoot fireballs and take down those crazy T-Rexes one by one!

FEATURES

- Awesome graphics.
- Everything unlocked!
- Cool soundtrack.
